achievements.title: Foundational Knowledge
achievements.description: Strong, hands-on knowledge of Windows Systems and Hardware, developed through extensive training, including the CompTIA curriculum.

achievements.title: Commitment to Growth
achievements.description: Actively pursuing the full DevOps certification roadmap, starting with Azure Fundamentals, to ensure my skills are always cutting-edge and cloud-ready.

projects.title: Cloud Cost Optimization
projects.problem: Monthly cloud bills were spiraling, with un-tagged and underutilized resources causing a 25% budget overshoot.
projects.solution: Implemented automated resource tagging, shutdown schedules, and rightsized idle VMs using [IaC Tool] and [Cloud Feature/Script].
projects.outcome: Reduced cloud spend by $7,500/month (a 20% saving) within 60 days.

projects.title: Zero-Downtime Deployment
projects.problem: Deployments were manual, took over an hour, and often required 5-10 minutes of production downtime.
projects.solution: Designed and built a new, fully automated CI/CD pipeline using [CI/CD Tool] with a [Deployment Strategy].
projects.outcome: Deployment time cut from 60 minutes to under 8 minutes. Achieved 100% zero-downtime deployments.

projects.title: Proactive Monitoring Suite
projects.problem: Incident response was reactive. Failure was only learned about after customers complained (MTTR of 45+ minutes).
projects.solution: Deployed a centralized logging/monitoring solution using [Monitoring Tool] and [Logging Tool] with custom alerts.
projects.outcome: Reduced MTTR by 80% (from 45+ minutes to less than 8 minutes) by alerting the team to impending failures.

projects.title: Infrastructure Hardening
projects.problem: Firewall and access management rules were inconsistent and undocumented, creating a significant security and compliance risk.
projects.solution: Documented all network flows and enforced principle of least privilege by implementing [IAM/Security Tool] via [Automation/Scripting].
projects.outcome: Passed a mandatory external security audit on the first attempt. Eliminated all critical unauthorized access paths.

projects.title: Automated System Recovery
projects.problem: System failures required a tedious, 4-hour manual recovery process that halted operations.
projects.solution: Created a "self-healing" utility using [Config Management Tool] to automatically detect and repair common system faults.
projects.outcome: Recovery time for major system failure reduced from 4 hours to less than 15 minutes, ensuring business continuity.
